title: Blended Education Course Based on Spaced Learning to Improve Medical Knowledge Retention

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Blended learning in a digital device-supported environment for current medical professionals, verifying the practicality of learning outcomes through project-based assessments

learning_goals: Learners will be able to accurately restate over 85% of core medical concepts after six months.
Learners will achieve a 20% or greater improvement in knowledge retention through spaced retrieval tests administered at three-month intervals.
Learners will maintain a participation rate of 90% or higher in weekly spaced learning modules delivered via a digital platform.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
